lom:description.lom:string: "The proliferation of graphical user interfaces has had a dramatic impact on the ability to work as a programmer. It is particularly difficult for the blind to create forms for visual programming applications, such as Visual Basic. A scripting language is introduced that enables the blind to create Visual Basic forms without needing to specify a great deal of detail and without needing the "point and click" approach that they cannot use. Related issues of accommodating the blind in a computer science course are also discussed."

lom:keyword.lom:string: visual basic, visual programming, career path, GUI, graphic user interface, blind, visually impaired, C++, project, computer science

lom:title.lom:string: Visual programming and the blind: the challenge and the opportunity
